scripts.docker:start: bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed && bun run build && bun run web:start
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/db && npx prisma migrate deploy && cd ../..
scripts.db:seed: bun run packages/db/src/truncate.ts &&  bun run packages/db/src/coreSeed.ts && bun run packages/db/src/foodseed1.ts && bun run packages/db/src/cuisine.ts && bun run packages/db/src/rec.ts && cd ../..
scripts.db:generate: cd packages/db && npx prisma generate && cd ../..
